txt.en: Defeated Darkwing spies in the Mirk-eaves ([placeholder]/[placeholder])
Defeated a Warg-scout in the Mirk-eaves ([placeholder]/[placeholder])
The Elves of the Golden Host have established an encampment on the shores of the Mirk-eaves and seek to protect it against the spies of the Enemy.

'If you have a moment, [placeholder], I would speak with you. Our forces landed recently upon this shore and drove off the Orcs after a mighty battle; however, many dark creatures have been seen lurking upon these shores still.

'Many Wargs and crebain roam the Mirk-eaves, undoubtedly spying for the Enemy at Dol Guldur. The eyes of Dol Guldur must be blinded to our movements. If you would purge the crebain and Wargs from these shores, I would be most grateful.

'Be wary upon your task, for goblin-scouts also roam the beaches, and they may ambush you.'
Crebain and Wargs can be found throughout the Mirk-eaves.\n\nFaroniel has asked you to blind the eyes of Dol Guldur by defeating many of the crebain and Wargs which roam the Mirk-eaves.
'Very good, [placeholder]! It will be long ere the eyes of Dol Guldur will be fixed upon us. Perhaps by then, the rest of our forces will have joined us.'
Faroniel is at Echad Sirion in the Mirk-eaves.\n\nYou should return to Faroniel with tidings of your success.
'Have you defeated the spies of Dol Guldur? Their masters must not learn how small our camp is.'
'The hounds of the Enemy are a vicious breed, best used as war-beasts, but they are silent enough to make good scouts, as well.'
'The crebain of Dunland serve Saruman the White, but I distrust all crows.'
Defeat Darkwing spies in the Mirk-eaves ([placeholder]/[placeholder])
Talk to Faroniel at Echad Sirion
